headline: A Look At PTC (PTC) Valuation After Earnings Beat, Guidance Upgrade And New FlexPLM Client Win
summary: Why PTC Stock Is Back in Focus After Earnings and New Client Win PTC (PTC) is back on many investors radar after a combination of better than expected quarterly results, higher full year guidance, and a fresh enterprise win for its FlexPLM software with SPG Company. See our latest analysis for PTC. PTC shares are trading at US$156.77 after a 4.0% 1 day share price gain. However, the 30 day and year to date share price returns of 5.9% and 7.8% declines indicate momentum has cooled, even as the...

headline: PTC FlexPLM Win With SPG Highlights Cloud Growth And Valuation Gap
summary: PTC (NasdaqGS:PTC) has been selected by SPG Company to provide its FlexPLM solution. SPG Company is replacing its legacy product lifecycle management system with PTC's cloud based FlexPLM platform. The partnership focuses on modernizing product lifecycle operations and supporting SPG Company's digital transformation goals. For you as an investor, this FlexPLM win adds another data point to how PTC positions itself in product lifecycle management software. The company focuses on cloud based...
